mean_cn: n. 长方形，椭圆形；  adj. 长方形的，椭圆形的
mean_en: having four straight sides that meet at right angles and having two opposite sides that are short and two opposite sides that are long
word_etyma: ob向前 + long长 → oblong 椭圆，长方形
sentence: My computer screen is oblong in shape.
sentence_trans: 我的电脑屏幕是长方形的。
